(Robo, you speak pure idiocy.  The Rock has more charisma skill than that 
flabby Flair who can ONLY win by cheating.  He and Hulk Hogan need to be shot 
like horses that break a leg or be put in an old folk's home.  The Rock will 
kick ass, and Booker T. doesn't even have a personality like ANY WWF 
superstar.  "I'm going to win, sucka."  Come on, give me a break no one wants 
a loser like that for champion)
